Hi,

Can anyone share their experiences with designing REST APIs using MVC =
style frameworks (such as Rails, Django,PHP MVC, etc.)? 

There seem to be =
two ways to design such APIs when accompanied with UI - 
1) APIs and UIs in=
 separate spaces (having a separate URI path for API versus UI for the same=
 resource) 
2) Same URI for each resource, but using some form of content n=
egotiation to return UI formats like html or API formats like XML.

Do you =
have any thoughts on the advantages and disadvantages of using either appro=
ach? 

Thanks
Anand
